Entries.divorced: ฉันคิดว่าเราจะเข้ากันได้ดี ฉันคงคิดไปเองสินะ $s
Entries.breakUp: เธอให้อะไรฉันเนี่ย ...?$7#$b#*huff*... เธอเลือกเองนะ  ฉันไม่ใช่เด็กห้าขวบ ฉันไม่ขอเธอเป็นเพื่อน$a
Entries.Mon8: รู้มั้ย ฉันเคยหวังโชคและชื่อเสียง แต่ฉันได้เปลี่ยนความคิดใหม่ และผลลัพธ์ก็น่าพอใจ ว่าไหมล่ะ #$e#ฉันยังคงเดินตามฝันของฉัน แม้ไม่มีใครสนใจก็ตาม
Entries.Fri8: หวัดดี @. ;วันนี้เธอแต่งตัวโก้จัง$h
Entries.Sat10: เป็นช่วงยากลำบากของฉัน ที่จะมุ่งมั่นออกกำลังกายใหม่ การรักษาหุ่นนั้นสำคัญกับฉัน แต่ยังมีสิ่งที่อยากลองอีกมาก#$e#ฉันว่านี่คือการหาสมดุล!$h
Entries.fall_Thu10: @! ดีใจที่ได้เจอ!$h
Entries.winter_Tue4: นี่, @. ช่วยอะไรฉันหน่อยได้มั้ย?#$b#ถ้าเธอเจอเฮลีย์ ฝากบอกว่าฉันไปสายนิดหน่อย ฉันไปทำธุระให้คุณย่า
Entries.event_box3: ...ขอบคุณนะ, @. ช่วยได้มากเลย เธอคือเพื่อนที่ดีที่สุดในเมืองนี้.#$b#ยินดีที่ได้รู้จัก จะดูเป็นคำพูดที่น่าอายไหม?$l
Entries.NPC.cs.3980: ...!!! เธอต้องการร่วมชีวิตกันหรือ? ในฐานะ {{RelationshipLabel}}เนี่ยนะ? ใช่!!!!$h#$b#ตอบว่า 'ใช่' เหมือนทำให้ 'ใจฉันพองโต' ถ้าเป็นฉันก็คงตอบว่า ใช่...ฮ่าๆ เธอคิดเหมือนฉันไหม$h#$b#ณ ที่นี้ พวกเราได้หมั้นหมายที่จะแต่งงาน ฉันจะเป็นคนเตรียมงาน พีธีผูกสัญญาจะเริ่ม 3 วัน โอเคนะ?$l
Entries.NPC.cs.3962: เธออยากสนิทกับฉันจริงๆหรอ?ฉันกลัวว่า ฉันพังความประทับใจแรก โล่งอกไปที What a relief!$h#$e#ฉันนี่นะ กังวลไม่เป็นเรื่อง แต่ฉันก็ไม่ใส่ใจแล้วล่ะ$h
Entries.NPC.cs.3963: เธออยากเป็นเพื่อนที่ดีกว่านี้? ใครจะไม่อยาก!$h#$e#แต่ก็...นะ พูดตามตรง ฉันอยาก มันมีความหมายสำหรับฉันมาก$l
Entries.NPC.cs.3985: ฉันได้ยินมาว่า เธอได้มอบของให้ใครบางคน#$e#เธอช่างเป็นเพื่อนที่ดีเสียจริง!$h
Entries.NPC.cs.4425: ชีวิตได้เปลี่ยนไป ตั้งแต่พวกเราเป็น {{RelationshipLabel}}...กันแล้ว$s
Entries.NPC.cs.4001: โค้ชเคยแบ่งผลไม้นั้นให้ฉัน$h#$b#ฉันคงต้องพูดว่า ขอบคุณที่เข้ามาในชีวิตฉัน. ตั้งแต่รู้จักเธอ ฉันก็มีความสุขและมั่นใจขึ้น #$b#ฉันเคยคิดนะว่า  ไม่มีใครแยแสด้วย ถ้าฉันไม่อยู่กับเรื่องเพ้อฝัน  แต่เธอทำให้เห็นว่า ฉันแค่คิดไปเอง#$b#คนอื่นคงไม่อะไรกับฉันหรอก ต่อให้ฉันไม่ดัง ไม่ได้หุ่นดี  หรือเอ่ยความในใจบ้างก็ตาม#$b# จะว่าไป ถึงฉันยอมรับอย่างเต็มปากว่า  ฉันรักเธอ  @. แต่ เธอคือเพื่อนที่ดีที่สุดในชีวิต$l
Entries.Event.cs.1736: $q -1 null#Sup?#$r -1 0 danceAsk#(Ask Alex to be your dance partner)#$r -1 0 null#Nevermind...

Entries.NPC.cs.4446: รู้สึกเหมือนพึ่งนอน ไม่ได้นอนทั้งคืน ไม่มั่นใจเลย ว่าจะเป็นพ่อที่ดีได้...$s#$b#หวังว่า บริษัทจัดหาบุตรบุญธรรม จะมาในเร็ววัน
Entries.NPC.cs.4443: ฉันเหนื่อย เธอทำอาหารเช้าเองได้มั้ย?$s
Entries.NPC.cs.4444: {{TermofEndearment}},ไม่อยากเชื่อ ว่าจะได้เลี้ยงลูก#$e#เธอคิดว่าฉันน่ะ... จะเป็นพ่อที่ดีกว่าพ่อฉันได้ไหม?$s
Entries.NPC.cs.4447: {{TermofEndearment}},ไม่ยักเชื่อว่าจะได้เป็นพ่อคน!#$e#เธอคิดว่าฉันจะ... เป็นพ่อได้ดีกว่าพ่อของฉันไหม?$s

Entries.NPC.cs.4448: {{TermofEndearment}},ฉันกล้าพูดเลยว่า เธอจะเป็นพ่อแม่ที่ดี

Entries.Wed_inlaw_Alex: อเล็กซ์จะยอมรับเป็น '{{RelationshipLabel}},' ไหม?#$e#ในแต่ละวันของฉัน ไม่ว่าเธอแต่งงานแล้วหรือไม่ ตอนนี้ได้เปลี่ยนไปแล้ว เธอคือครอบครัวเดียวกันแล้ว

Entries.Good_0: @... I really care about you. I don't think I say that enough.$l#$e#My dad would say it's 'unmanly' to say those things to your friends. But I'm done listening to him.$a
Entries.Good_1: ฉันมีความสุขจริงๆ ที่ได้อยู่ที่ฟาร์มนี้กับเธอ และเธอก็ทำให้ฉันรู้สึกว่า ฉันคู่ควรกับความรู้สึกนี้$l

Entries.Rainy_Day_4: ฉันว่าฉันควรเริ่มอ่านหนังสือ ฉันต้องการเรียนรู้ เกี่ยวกับเกษตรกรรม จะได้ช่วยงานในฟาร์มได้!
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: โอ้...กลิ่นนี่มัน? ฉันกินกระเทียมมาตลอดวัน I'm trying to stay manly... Sorry.$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: อ๊า... ไม่มีอะไรดีไปกว่า การหลับฝันดีในฟาร์ม!$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: เฮ่ @! ฉันทำอาหารเช้าร้อนๆ[195 210 211]#$e#ถ้าอยากแข็งแรง ก็ต้องกินอย่างที่ตั้งใจไว้!
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: ฉันยังคงทำอาหารและซักผ้า... ไม่ใช่สิ่งที่ฉันชอบหรอก แต่เป็นสิ่งที่คนในบ้านต้องทำ!$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: เธอไปตัดผม หรือทำอะไรมาหรือเปล่า? วันนี้เธอดูดีมาก! Maybe it's all that fresh air.$h
Entries.Outdoor_3: Look at us, with our little farm. We make a good team.$h
Entries.OneKid_3: I think I'm really bonding with the kiddo. I'm relieved...I wasn't sure if I'd be a good dad.#$e#I try to follow my mom's example.
Entries.TwoKids_3: I finally have the family life that I missed out on as a kid... thank you.

Entries.winter_28: ช่างเป็นปีที่วิเศษ, @. ฉันกำลังตั้งตารอขึ้นปีใหม่!
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: ว้าว เธอดูกล้ามแขนนี่สิ! You're getting ripped from all that farm work.
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: I had to buy a bunch of new shorts. I shrunk my old ones in the laundry...$s

Entries.Indoor_Night_Alex: I feel exhausted... That's a good sign! It means I worked hard enough today.$h
Entries.spouseRoom_Alex: #$c .5#Don't ever let me get lazy. I want to stay in good shape so I can help on the farm!#$e#There's lots of room here to do my exercises. I'm making more progress than ever!

I’ve already apologized for that. But I’ve been thinking about why I acted that way in the first place.$s"/pause 800/speak Alex "I think I felt like... if I wasn’t the best, it would mean my dad was right when he said I was worthless. I could either be this elite athlete or a total failure, you know?$s#$b#But watching you fix up that old farm... using your strength to build things, and grow things, and feed people...$l#$b#It made me realize that I get to decide what success means to me. Playing sports isn’t the only way I can be good at something that matters.#$b#I don’t think Mom would want me to limit myself, either. So I’ve been looking into other careers where physical fitness is important. I never realized how many options I have!$h#$b#I'm not sure what I'll choose yet, but I'm done pinning all my self-worth on one dream. And, well...#$b#...Turns out, if I ease up on the gridball training, I have time for dinners with my best friend.$l#$b#Not to get all mushy, but... you’re really important to me, @. You inspire me. I can't wait to show you where I go from here.$l"/pause 400/emote Alex 40/pause 600/question fork1 "#No matter what you end up doing, your work ethic will take you far.#So you’re really giving up on pro sports? That sucks..."/pause 400/fork rejectJosh/speak Alex "Thanks, @. That means a lot to me.$l"/emote Alex 32/pause 800/animate Alex false false 400 40 41 41 40 41 41 40 41 41 40 41 41 40/pause 800/playSound eat/pause 800/playSound eat/pause 800/playSound eat/pause 800/playSound gulp/pause 400/speak Alex "Mmm... this steak is outstanding. Can you smell that fragrant sauce?$10"/eyes 1 -4000/animate Alex false false 400 40 41 41 40 41 41 40/pause 1000/specificTemporarySprite alexDiningDog/playSound dogWhining/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 6000/end dialogue Alex "Thanks for listening, @.$l"
Entries.rejectJosh: pause 100/playMusic none/shake Alex 2000/emote Alex 28/speak Alex "... I mean... I saw this as a step forward for me... I thought you would support me.$s"/pause 2000/speak Alex "I'm not hungry anymore...$s"/viewport move 1 1 5000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 4000/end dialogue Alex "Thanks for hearing me out, I guess.$s"

Entries.3917590/n saloonSportsRoom/O Alex: distantBanjo/-100 -100/farmer 31 20 0 Alex 32 7 0 Shane 33 8 0 Gus 34 8 0 Kent 35 8 0 George 36 7 0/skippable/specificTemporarySprite gridballGameTV/viewport 34 7 true/move farmer 0 -13 1 true/pause 1000/textAboveHead Alex "Big play!"/pause 600/jump Gus/pause 2000/textAboveHead George "Score!"/pause 400/textAboveHead Alex "There we go!"/faceDirection Kent 3 true/faceDirection Gus 1 true/animate Gus false true 100 22/animate Kent false true 100 17/shake Gus 500/shake Kent 500/pause 500/textAboveHead George "Atta boy!"/pause 1000/stopAnimation Gus/stopAnimation Kent/faceDirection Kent 0 true/faceDirection Gus 0/pause 1000/faceDirection Alex 3/pause 400/speak Alex "Hey, @! You made it!$h"/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "So... what do you think?"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/faceDirection Alex 3/speak Alex "I've been thinking... You know how I used to want to be a pro athlete someday?#$b#Well, I'm happier living on the farm with you than I ever was chasing that dream!$h#$b#But even though gridball isn't my only focus anymore, it's still a part of my life...#$b#... so I thought it would be cool to have a place where us guys could hang out and watch the Sunday game. Gus liked the idea so much he offered me part of his back room!$h"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 600/faceDirection George 3/speak George "You did good, son. I could watch this at home, but coming here makes me feel young again!$h"/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "Thanks, Grandpa."/pause 500/speak Kent "I'm happy for an excuse to get out of the house, and take my mind off things."/faceDirection Alex 2/pause 100/textAboveHead Shane "Same"/pause 1200/speak Gus "I'm having a lot of fun. And it's good for business!$h#$b#Though maybe not so good for Shane's liver...$s"/pause 100/faceDirection Shane 2 true/animate Shane false true 100 18/jump Shane/pause 500/textAboveHead Shane "Hey!"/pause 500/emote Alex 32/pause 2000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 400/message "It seems the guys have a new Sunday tradition."/pause 1000/message "5,000g well spent!"/pause 1000/end dialogue Alex "Thanks again for the money, @. It was a fun project for me, and all the guys seem happy with it!$h"

distantBanjo/-100 -100/farmer 31 20 0 Alex 32 7 0 Shane 33 8 0 Gus 34 8 0 Kent 35 8 0 George 36 7 0/skippable/specificTemporarySprite gridballGameTV/viewport 34 7 true/move farmer 0 -13 1 true/pause 1000/textAboveHead Alex "Big play!"/pause 600/jump Gus/pause 2000/textAboveHead George "Score!"/pause 400/textAboveHead Alex "There we go!"/faceDirection Kent 3 true/faceDirection Gus 1 true/animate Gus false true 100 22/animate Kent false true 100 17/shake Gus 500/shake Kent 500/pause 500/textAboveHead George "Atta boy!"/pause 1000/stopAnimation Gus/stopAnimation Kent/faceDirection Kent 0 true/faceDirection Gus 0/pause 1000/faceDirection Alex 3/pause 400/speak Alex "Hey, @! You made it!$h"/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "So... what do you think?"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/faceDirection Alex 3/speak Alex "I've been thinking... You know how I used to dream of being a pro athlete someday?#$b#Well, I'm happier living on the farm with you than I ever was chasing that dream!$h#$b#But even though gridball isn't my only focus anymore, it's still a part of my life...#$b#... so I thought it would be cool to have a place where us guys could hang out and watch the Sunday game. Gus liked the idea so much he offered me part of his back room!$h"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 600/faceDirection George 3/speak George "You did good, son. Entries.Tue10: Hey. You're lookin' good today!$h#$e#So what's new?
Entries.Fri10: Hey, let me know if you ever want some help with your farmwork.#$e#I've gotta do something that's more than just exercise for its own sake, right?$h
Entries.Sun10: Haley and I always thought we could be the town's 'power couple,' but it was always complicated.#$e#I'd still like to make things work with her. But if that never happens, at least we're still friends.
Entries.summer_Sun10: @, I wonder sometimes whether my mom would be proud of me.$s#$e#I think she'd be happy I found a friend like you. I guess that's something.$l#$e#See you around.$l
Entries.fall_Thu10: @! Hey!$h#$b#Is it cool if we hang out soon?
Entries.fall_Fri10: I really do think Haley and I could have something special together. I just wish she listened to me the way you do.#$e#I feel like I always have to act like a big shot around her. And if I told her how I really feel, she'd just lose interest in me.$s#$e#I guess it's okay to have different people in my life fulfill different emotional needs. I'm glad I have a friend I can open up to.$l
Entries.winter_Tue10: Hey! What's up?$h#$e#Are you bored, too? Hey, we can hang out anytime.

Entries.Tue10: Hey. You're lookin' good today!$h#$e#So what's new?
Entries.Fri10: Hey, let me know if you ever want some help with your farmwork.#$e#I've gotta do something that's more than just exercise for its own sake, right?$h
Entries.Sun10: Haley and I always thought we could be the town's 'power couple,' but it was always complicated.#$e#I'd still like to make things work with her. But if that never happens, at least we're still friends.
Entries.summer_Sun10: @, I wonder sometimes whether my mom would be proud of me.$s#$e#I think she'd be happy I found a friend like you. I guess that's something.#$e#See you around.
Entries.fall_Thu10: @! Hey!$h#$b#Is it cool if we hang out soon?
Entries.fall_Fri10: I really do think Haley and I could have something special together. I just wish she listened to me the way you do.#$e#I feel like I always have to act like a big shot around her. And if I told her how I really feel, she'd just lose interest in me.$s#$e#I guess it's okay to have different people in my life fulfill different emotional needs. I'm glad I have a friend I can open up to.
Entries.winter_Tue10: Hey! What's up?$h#$e#Are you bored, too? Hey, we can hang out anytime.
Entries.winter_Mon10: I think I disagree that high school is the best years of your life.#$b#This year, for one, has been better.$h
Entries.winter_Fri10: @, are your parents proud of you?#$e#Well, here's one guy who's pretty proud of you.$h
Entries.fall_Thu6: I remember the final play of the regional championship game. The score was tied, and we were just ten seconds away from the end.#$b#I saw the leaves go flying around in a gust of wind, and I threw the ball, knowing the wind would knock it to the side a bit.#$b#Zane caught it perfectly and we scored. No overtime.#$e#It was a good feeling, y'know?$h
Entries.summer_Mon10: It's weird. I never really talked about my feelings with many people before I met you.#$e#I feel like I can just be myself.
Entries.fall_Mon10: Tunnelers won again last night! They're having an amazing season this year!$h#$e#Sorry, I am really happy right now.$h

Entries.Rainy_Day_4: #$c .5# วันนี้ช่างเหมาะแก่การอ่านหนังสือ ฉันอยากศึกษาเรื่องการเกษตร จะได้ช่วยงานเธอในฟาร์ม!#I'm trying to catch up on all the books I was supposed to read in high school. Sometimes they start out boring, but they're actually really good!
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: #$c .5#Oh... the smell? I've been eating garlic all day. I'm trying to stay manly... Sorry.$h#I wonder what it'd be like to stand under a waterfall...?
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: #$c .5#Feels good to stay in good health! We only get one body. Gotta make use of it!$h#Ahh... there's nothing like a good night's sleep on the farm!$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: Hey, @! I made you a hot breakfast.[195 210 211]#$e#$c .5#If you want to get strong, you have to eat like you mean it!#Good food, straight from the source! I'm so glad we've got this farm.$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: #$c .5#I'm still getting used to cooking and doing laundry... It's not exactly my favorite, but it's all part of being a good housemate!$h#I got some books from the library that I need to finish before they're due. I want to keep my mind as fit as my body.
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: #$c .5#There's a couple things around the house that I'm going to try and fix today. Don't worry about me, I'm not bored.#Leave the cleaning to me today! I like to think I pull off the look of that one cleaning brand mascot.$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: #$c .5#Did you get a haircut or something? You look great today! Maybe it's all that fresh air.$h#Another busy day? I like that you keep as active as you do.
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: #$c .5#If you need some quiet time to yourself, that's okay with me.#Hey, @! Did you push it to the limit today?
Entries.Outdoor_3: #$c .5#Glad I got up in time to see the early morning. It's always the best part of the day, but it's so easy to miss if you sleep in.$h#Look at us, with our little farm. We make a good team.$h
Entries.OneKid_3: #$c .5#I think I'm really bonding with the kiddo.$h#Ahh, little %kid1... you've got a lot of life in front of you, don't ya?$h
Entries.fall_3: ฉันเกือบลืม นี่ฤดูแซลมอน! รู้มั้ยว่าวิเศษขนาดไหน?$h#$e#กระทะแซลมอนย่างเนย บีบมะนาวราด และมีผักเคลแต่งไว้ข้างจาน และ... ธัญพืชอะไรก็ได้ แต่ไม่นับข้าวนะ$h

Entries.TwoKids_2: #$c .5#When the kids get bigger, I don't suppose you could spare some of the farm space to make a little gridball field...?$h#Maybe %kid2 will be the first professional gridball player from Pelican Town?$h
Entries.TwoKids_3: #$c .5#I finally have the family life that I missed out on as a kid... thank you.#It'd be great if the kids are into sports. I want to make sure they stay healthy. But I'll support them in any kind of life they choose.

Entries.winter_28: It's been a great year, @. I'm looking forward to next year!
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: #$c .5#Wow, look at those biceps! You're getting ripped from all that farm work.#Today's a good day to read something. ...Yeah, I've been keeping that going.$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: #$c .5#I had to buy a bunch of new shorts. I shrunk my old ones in the laundry...$s#I feel like my mom can rest at peace, knowing how things have worked out for me. I'm lucky to have you in my life.

Entries.PlayerKilled: none/-100 -100/farmer 20 10 2 {{Spouse}} 19 10 1 Marlon 18 10 3/skippable/pause 1500/showFrame 5/message " ...{2}?"/pause 1000/message " {{TermofEndearment}}, wake up!"/viewport 19 10 true/pause 1500/speak {{Spouse}} "Hey, are you good to stand? Come on, I'll boost you up."/pause 500/emote farmer 40/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/speak {{Spouse}} "Okay, hear this. I was just running laps up in the mountains when I realized that something was pulling me towards the mines.#$b#It was honestly a little creepy, and got me thinking that you might be calling out for me, or something. So I came down here to find you."/pause 1000/speak Marlon "And I simply came along to clear a path for Alex while we brought you back up to the surface.#$b#At first, I was to venture in alone, but he insisted on coming along.#$b#You're blessed to have ended up sharing your life with someone so courageous."/emote {{Spouse}} 16/pause 500/speak {{Spouse}} "Oh, it's nothing. Punching a slime here and there isn't much of a workout, though I totally see how easy it is to get overwhelmed.#$b#I guess I'm only courageous when I got someone at my back to prevent that from happening."/pause 1000/speak Marlon "It's in my nature to be frank. I'm simply stating the fact of what I saw. You did well, standing by my side."/pause 500/move Marlon 0 0 1/pause 500/faceDirection Marlon 3/speak Marlon "At any rate, it's best to leave for now. @ needs to rest and recuperate. You two shouldn't linger."/pause 500/textAboveHead Marlon "Farewell."/move Marlon 0 4 0/warp Marlon -100 -100/pause 1500/speak {{Spouse}} "Hey, let's head on home. Want to jog down the mountain with me?#$b#Oh, wait. You probably shouldn't be exerting yourself right now. You don't look too injured, but let's still be careful.#$b#I'll jog ahead and tidy up so you can crash when you get there. Meet you at home!$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 20/faceDirection farmer 2/showFrame 0/pause 500/minedeath/end dialogue {{Spouse}} "Hey, welcome back! You're not looking too bad, for someone who was KO'ed a little while ago. Don't worry, it's our secret. And Marlon's.$1#$c 0.7#I'm going to set the example and take it easy tonight. That means you have to take it easy, too, alright?$1#$b#You should eat a snack with protein in it to help your muscles heal. Here, try some of mine.[210 215 223 228 232 243 403 406 651]$1"

none/-100 -100/farmer 20 12 2 Harvey 21 12 3 {{Spouse}} 22 8 2/skippable/pause 1500/showFrame 5/message " ...{0}?"/pause 1000/message "Easy, now... take it slow."/viewport 20 12 true/pause 1000/speak Harvey "Hello @, I'm glad you're finally awake.#$b#Someone brought you back here unconscious and badly injured. I had to take you in for emergency surgery!"/speed {{Spouse}} 5/move {{Spouse}} 0 3 2/textAboveHead {{Spouse}} "{0}!"/emote farmer 16/move {{Spouse}} -1 0 2/faceDirection farmer 1/move Harvey 1 0 3/move {{Spouse}} 0 1 3/speak {{Spouse}} "{{TermofEndearment}}, are you okay? I must've beat my personal time running here when I heard you were hurt!$2"/emote farmer 60/pause 500/speak {{Spouse}} "Did you almost get eaten by slimes, or something? The risk of that happening is always on my mind.$2#$b#I know you're strong, but things like this make me worry even more for you.$2"/emote {{Spouse}} 40/pause 1500/emote farmer 28/pause 500/pause 500/speak Harvey "Your condition is much better now, @, but please be more careful next time.$2"/pause 500/speak Harvey "I'll give you two a moment together."/pause 500/move Harvey 0 -4 0/move Harvey -8 0 0 true/move Harvey 0 -1 0/move Harvey -4 0 0/move Harvey 0 -1 0/playSound doorClose/warp Harvey -100 -100/pause 500/faceDirection {{Spouse}} 3/speak {{Spouse}} "You know I'm all about pushing personal limits, but this is just excessive.$2#$b#I don't know what I'd do if I lost you, too, alright?$2#$b#I've had enough of people I love leaving me behind.$2"/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/emote farmer 28/hospitaldeath/end dialogue {{Spouse}} "Hey. I jogged back to get the place ready for you to relax. Pushing yourself when you're exhausted won't do you any favors, trust me.#$c 0.7#{{TermofEndearment}}, you look really tired. You really should rest today. Injuries that don't heal all the way can follow you for a long time.#$b#I got you some of this, too. It's full of protein, to help heal your injuries. [237 241 203 204 220 244 272]"

none/-100 -100/farmer 20 12 2 Harvey 21 12 3 Alex 22 8 2/skippable/pause 1500/showFrame 5/message " ...{0}?"/pause 1000/message "Easy, now... take it slow."/viewport 20 12 true/pause 1000/speak Harvey "Hello @, I'm glad you're finally awake.#$b#Someone brought you back here unconscious and badly injured. I had to take you in for emergency surgery!"/faceDirection farmer 1/emote farmer 16/pause 500/speak Harvey "Your condition is much better now, @, but please be more careful next time.$2"/pause 500/emote Harvey 40/pause 500/faceDirection Harvey 0/faceDirection Harvey 3/pause 500/speak Harvey "You... have a visitor, by the way. They've been here since you went into surgery, and they were just waiting to talk to you.#$b#Just as it's their right to visit, though, it's also your right to refuse visitors. I'm a button-push away, if you need me."/move Harvey 1 0 1/move Harvey 0 -3 0/pause 1000/speak Harvey "@ is ready to see you.#$b#It's not my place to get involved in private matters, but all I ask is that you remember that @ needs rest."/pause 500/speak Alex "Nah, I get it. We don't have much to say to each other anyway.$9"/pause 500/textAboveHead Harvey "Alright. Take care."/move Harvey -7 0 0 true/move Harvey 0 -4 0/warp Harvey -100 -100/move Alex 0 4 3/emote farmer 16/faceDirection Alex 3/pause 1000/speak Alex "Hey. Harvey really worked a miracle putting you back together, huh. Guess I worried for nothing.$9#$b#Hmm? Of course I'd worry. We may not be {{RelationshipLabel}} anymore, or even friends, but that doesn't mean I want you dead. Who do you think I am?$9#$b#...Sorry. I'm not trying to pick a fight. I'll go.$2"/emote farmer 16/pause 1000/speak Alex "Truth is, I just didn't want you waking up alone from that.$2#$b#You didn't see yourself when you got here. I imagine getting hurt like that wasn't a joyride, so I wanted to stay until you woke up. Just in case.$2#$b#But... you're clearly fine now, so I'll leave you to it. I don't want to talk about any of what happened here later, either. Bye.$2"/pause 500/move Alex 0 -4 0/move Alex -8 0 0/move Alex 0 -3 0/warp Alex -100 -100/emote farmer 28/hospitaldeath/end dialogue Alex "Our friendship is over, @. I came to see you only because I can't forget you, even if...$2#$b#Even if I know that you're not the same person from my memories anymore.$2"

none/-100 -100/farmer 13 33 2 Willy 15 33 3/pause 1500/showFrame 5/message " ...{2}?"/pause 1000/message " {2}, wake up!"/viewport 13 33 clamp true/pause 1000/speak Willy "Are you alright? I found you face-down on the sand here and feared the worst for a moment."/emote farmer 16/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/speak Willy "You should be careful when venturing in that volcano there.#$b#With that boy Leo now gone to Stardew Valley, there's much less chance of anyone finding you if you're hurt.#$b#Ah... Your clothes are singed badly and you're smeared in ash. I hope you don't give your {{SocialMenuLabel}} a fright when you return home.$1"/faceDirection farmer 2/showFrame 0/pause 1000/emote farmer 28/minedeath/end dialogue {{Spouse}} "Whoa there! @, is that really you? What happened?$7#$b#I'm glad you're okay, but you still look -and smell- like an overcooked steak. It's sort of impressive, actually.$2#$b#Hey, hold on... if you streak some of the ash on your cheek this way... And some of it like this...#$b#Hah. You look like a gridball player like this. Nice face paint!$1"

Entries.marriage_beach: Hey, you alright? You're looking a little burnt. Be careful.$s
Entries.marriage_beach2: Nothing beats hanging out at the beach with you.$l
Entries.marriage_bus4: Hey, @, before you head off I wanted to tell you something.#$b#You're my best friend.$l
Entries.marriage_bus8: Morning, again. Heading out early?#$b#{{Random: %Alex gives you a manly hug. ++ Mind picking up some protein for me if you got the time?$h ++ You look like you're ready to face whatever the day throws at you!$h ++ Have fun today. Not to get sappy, but I'll miss you.$s |inputSeparator=++}}#$b#Well, catch ya later then.
Entries.marriage_dog3: Dusty's been with me for half my life.#$b#I could never bring myself to leave him alone. Same goes for you.$l
Entries.marriage_josh3: Having a good day? I'm sure you got a lot of farmwork done today.#$b#{{Random: Me? I'm just watching over Grandma and Grandpa., I dropped off some groceries today so help yourself to the fridge., %Alex high fives you.}}
Entries.marriage_josh5: I was looking at the photos on the wall there.#$b#{{Random: That's... baby Alex. Don't look at that!$7, We should get our family photo taken again soon.$h, Mom looks just as young as I remember her.$s}}
Entries.marriage_sum7: Haley always stops by my ice cream stand when it opens.$h
Entries.marriage_town5: I can't let myself go and slack off, never. Not when you've been working so hard.#$b#You believed in me, and I have to do the same. Sure, the goal isn't going pro anymore...#$b#...But I've gotta try to keep up with the toughest person I know.$l
Entries.marriage_town6: Ugh, I'm feeling unmotivated today...$s#$b#{{Random: %You give Alex a hug., Maybe you're who I needed to see right now.$l, Maybe I pushed myself too far yesterday...$s}}
Entries.marriage_town8: Hey, @. Catch!$u#$b#%You catch the ball.#$b#{{Random: Heh heh! You've got quick reflexes.$h, Nice one! High five!$h}}
Entries.marriage_tree3: I remember standing here thinking I'd go pro anytime soon and be out of this town.#$b#I'm sort of glad that never happened.$l
Entries.marriage_tree4: It was under this tree that I realized how important you really were to me.$9#$b#Not just that, but like... that it didn't mean we had to be 'in love.' That a friend could mean that much to me.#$b#I sat under here on the night before our commitment ceremony... I couldn't sleep.$s#$b#{{Random: I'm proud to be able to call myself your {{SocialMenuLabel}}.$l, Sorry... I'm not good with words. But I know you get me.$l}}
Entries.marriage_tree5: You know, this tree means quite a lot to me.$9#$b#Whenever I was questioning things, like what I wanted out of my life, I'd come here to sort through my thoughts.$s#$b#Usually it was after I'd been talking with you. You helped me rethink a lot of things... I don't know where I'd be without you.$l#$b#E-enough sappy talk. Uh, so what do you want for dinner?$9
Entries.marriage_doctorafter: I've never really liked visiting the doctor. I feel all cramped up in there.$s#$b#I'll be home soon.
Entries.marriage_nm: Think you'll do some deep-sea fishing tonight? Too bad there aren't any salmon down there.$h

Entries.marriage_beach: Hey, you alright? You're looking a little burnt. Be careful.$s
Entries.marriage_beach2: Nothing beats hanging out at the beach with you.$h
Entries.marriage_bus4: Hey, @, before you head off I wanted to tell you something.#$b#You're my best friend.$h
Entries.marriage_bus8: Morning, again. Heading out early?#$b#{{Random: %Alex gives you a manly hug. ++ Mind picking up some protein for me if you got the time?$h ++ You look like you're ready to face whatever the day throws at you!$h ++ Have fun today. Not to get sappy, but I'll miss you.$s |inputSeparator=++}}#$b#Well, catch ya later then.
Entries.marriage_dog3: Dusty's been with me for half my life.#$b#I could never bring myself to leave him alone. Same goes for you.
Entries.marriage_josh3: Having a good day? I'm sure you got a lot of farmwork done today.#$b#{{Random: Me? I'm just watching over Grandma and Grandpa., I dropped off some groceries today so help yourself to the fridge., %Alex high fives you.}}
Entries.marriage_josh5: I was looking at the photos on the wall there.#$b#{{Random: That's... baby Alex. Don't look at that!$7, We should get our family photo taken again soon.$h, Mom looks just as young as I remember her.$s}}
Entries.marriage_sum7: Haley always stops by my ice cream stand when it opens.$h
Entries.marriage_town5: I can't let myself go and slack off, never. Not when you've been working so hard.#$b#You believed in me, and I have to do the same. Sure, the goal isn't going pro anymore...#$b#...But I've gotta try to keep up with the toughest person I know.$h
Entries.marriage_town6: Ugh, I'm feeling unmotivated today...$s#$b#{{Random: %You give Alex a hug., Maybe you're who I needed to see right now., Maybe I pushed myself too far yesterday...$s}}
Entries.marriage_town8: Hey, @. Catch!$u#$b#%You catch the ball.#$b#{{Random: Heh heh! You've got quick reflexes.$h, Nice one! High five!$h}}
Entries.marriage_tree3: I remember standing here thinking I'd go pro anytime soon and be out of this town.#$b#I'm sort of glad that never happened.$h
Entries.marriage_tree4: It was under this tree that I realized how important you really were to me.$9#$b#Not just that, but like... that it didn't mean we had to be 'in love.' That a friend could mean that much to me.#$b#I sat under here on the night before our commitment ceremony... I couldn't sleep.$s#$b#{{Random: I'm proud to be able to call myself your {{SocialMenuLabel}}., Sorry... I'm not good with words. But I know you get me.}}
Entries.marriage_tree5: You know, this tree means quite a lot to me.$9#$b#Whenever I was questioning things, like what I wanted out of my life, I'd come here to sort through my thoughts.$s#$b#Usually it was after I'd been talking with you. You helped me rethink a lot of things... I don't know where I'd be without you.#$b#E-enough sappy talk. Uh, so what do you want for dinner?$9
Entries.marriage_doctorafter: I've never really liked visiting the doctor. I feel all cramped up in there.$s#$b#I'll be home soon.
Entries.marriage_nm: Think you'll do some deep-sea fishing tonight? Too bad there aren't any salmon down there.$h
Entries.marriage_town3: Wherever my Mom is, I hope she's proud of me.$s#$b#I didn't grow up to be the sports star I wanted to be, but I think I prefer this life more than anything.#$b#I know my Mom would understand.
Entries.marriage_tree: Grandma and Grandpa are getting old...$s#$b#{{Random: But I want to show them they don't have to worry about me anymore, and you've helped me with the first step. ++ I'm gonna miss Grandma's special casserole when she... Forget it.$s ++ They've supported me for most of my life. I wanna do the same now. |inputSeparator=++}}

Entries.marriage_beach4: Looking good, @! {{Random: Maybe it's the sun., You been working out with that sword of yours?, I bet you've got a lot of eyes on you today.}}
Entries.marriage_beach5: My body's always restless during summer.#$b#{{Random: I totally regret not bringing my ball with me today...$s, Maybe I'll go for a swim., This body was built for moving non stop.}}
Entries.marriage_beach7: Hey, I was hoping I'd see you here. You taking a break, or are you here to fish?
Entries.marriage_bh2: @, you here to work out too?$6#$b#Or to relax? That heated pool is awesome for sore muscles.$6
Entries.marriage_bh3: Cheer me on... *huff* I'm this close... *puff* to a new personal best!$6
